Articles.Content:
Airline Jet, Vikkers VK-12, capable of carrying 64 passenger and 4 crew members (68 total).

Download: [http://kerbalx.com/crafts/2750](http://kerbalx.com/crafts/2750)

![9D8UZfb.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/9D8UZfb.jpg)
<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>
Is that wing tip stock? Because if so I'm so stealing that small detail for my own uses!
It appears to be an advanced canard rotated around (and it probably has its controls locked) to look like a wingtip.

The only mod used are the landing gears...

And no, the advanced canards are not rotated, yes, they are locked... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
